snippet: A gift of property is one way to take advantage of a $5.12 million tax exemption that will soon expire. But shared property raises the question of its management.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column notes that a gift of property is one way to take advantage of a $5.12 million tax exemption that will soon expire, but such a gift raises the tricky questions of how to manage a shared property.
